name: Fushi
description:
In a Mythical Japanese world  you play as a mystical fox who has had their soul stolen by an evil yokai wisp!

Platform to reach your fragmented soul and regain lost powers. 

Created as a final year project by a team of 7

Michael Tate

Marcus Ing

David Passlow

Andrew Fitzpatrick

Kathryn Rynne

Zac Van Dyck

Jardene Rose

Special thanks to Caleb Osborne for Music!

Fushi was created to be played with a Gamepad Controller

It does have keyboard controls for the controller deficient. (They aren't mentioned in game, but are in the readme)
